narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ellen Mattingly is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in West Palm Beach, FL. From 2019-01 through 2020-07, this provider received $53K in Medicaid payments across 731 claims serving 173 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of billing is concentrated in 92507 (92507), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2020-07, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
